entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 01:58 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
